title: Chapter 1640 - Yu Sheng
body:
Chapter 1640 - Yu Sheng

Qin Feng.

He was a peak Saint Realm Immortal Lord, and one of the strongest participants in the Immortal Realm’s camp, yet he’d been annihilated in a flash!

This bloody scene was like a punch in the gut. 

Some of the onlookers were grief-stricken. Others’ hearts sank. Their first duel had ended in a loss. This was undoubtedly a heavy blow.

“And you thought you could take my head. You overestimate yourself!” Jin Zhong’s unbridled laughter resounded from the battlefield.

“The Immortal Realm’s Immortal Lords are worse and worse each time.” A Demon King shook his head in apparent disappointment.

“That really was quite lackluster.” Yin Beiwu furrowed his brow. “I thought that if I fought in the Immortal-Demon Deathmatch, I’d be able to fight some worthwhile opponents. If this is all they’ve got, I can’t even be bothered to fight.”

His contemptuous pride and confidence were mixed with blatantly unconcealed disappointment and disdain.

“Jin Zhong, would you like to step back and rest?” asked Yin Xiaotian. 

The rules of the Immortal-Demon Deathmatch permitted combatants to step back after a victory...
